alert.note: Alert for Blair; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 4:12PM EDT until September 09 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Northern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spruce Creek, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warriors Mark, Spruce Creek, Birmingham, Franklinville, Whipple Dam State Park, Mcalevys Fort, Petersburg and Alexandria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
